solution_line_template: He makes {minutes_per_hour}/{first_hour_rate_minutes}=<<{minutes_per_hour}/{first_hour_rate_minutes}={masks_first_hour}>>{masks_first_hour} in the first hour
He makes {minutes_per_hour}/{subsequent_hour_rate_minutes}=<<{minutes_per_hour}/{subsequent_hour_rate_minutes}={masks_subsequent_hour}>>{masks_subsequent_hour} in each subsequent hour
There are {total_shift_hours}-{first_hour_duration}=<<{total_shift_hours}-{first_hour_duration}={remaining_hours}>>{remaining_hours} more hours in his shift
